/* Clean & Bright Trading Theme */
/* 简洁明快的量化交易界面主题 */

:root {
  /* Core Background Colors - 明亮清爽的背景 */
  --bg-primary: #f8fafc;
  --bg-secondary: #ffffff;
  --bg-tertiary: #f1f5f9;
  --bg-quaternary: #e2e8f0;
  --bg-hover: #f8fafc;
  --bg-active: #e2e8f0;

  /* Surface Colors - 清爽的表面 */
  --surface-primary: #ffffff;
  --surface-secondary: #f8fafc;
  --surface-elevated: #ffffff;
  --surface-overlay: #ffffff;

  /* Clean Gradients - 简洁的渐变 */
  --gradient-primary: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8fafc 0%, #ffffff 100%);
  --gradient-surface: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff 0%, #f8fafc 100%);
  --gradient-card: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff 0%, #f8fafc 100%);
  --gradient-glass: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.9) 0%, rgba(248,250,252,0.8) 100%);

  /* Clean Glow Effects - 柔和的光晕 */
  --glow-primary: 0 0 15px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.15);
  --glow-success: 0 0 15px rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.15);
  --glow-danger: 0 0 15px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.15);
  --glow-warning: 0 0 15px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.15);

  /* Clean Border Effects - 清晰的边框 */
  --border-glow-primary: 1px solid rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.2);
  --border-glow-success: 1px solid rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.2);
  --border-glow-danger: 1px solid rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.2);
  --border-glow-warning: 1px solid rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.2);

  /* Premium Shadow Effects - 清爽的阴影 */
  --shadow-premium: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
  --shadow-premium-lg: 0 8px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
  --shadow-glass: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);

  /* Text Colors - 清晰的文字 */
  --text-primary: #1e293b;
  --text-secondary: #475569;
  --text-tertiary: #64748b;
  --text-muted: #94a3b8;
  --text-disabled: #cbd5e1;

  /* Market Data Colors - 鲜明的市场颜色 */
  --market-up: #10b981;
  --market-down: #ef4444;
  --market-neutral: #6366f1;
  --market-volatile: #f59e0b;

  /* Trading Colors */
  --buy-color: #10b981;
  --sell-color: #ef4444;
  --hold-color: #6366f1;

  /* Status Colors */
  --status-online: #10b981;
  --status-offline: #ef4444;
  --status-warning: #f59e0b;
  --status-info: #3b82f6;

  /* Interactive Elements - 明亮的交互元素 */
  --btn-primary: #3b82f6;
  --btn-primary-hover: #2563eb;
  --btn-secondary: #f1f5f9;
  --btn-secondary-hover: #e2e8f0;

  /* Form Elements - 清爽的表单 */
  --input-bg: #ffffff;
  --input-border: #e2e8f0;
  --input-focus: #3b82f6;
  --input-text: #1e293b;
  --input-placeholder: #94a3b8;

  /* Chart Colors - 清晰的图表 */
  --chart-grid: #f1f5f9;
  --chart-axis: #cbd5e1;
  --chart-line-up: #10b981;
  --chart-line-down: #ef4444;
  --chart-line-neutral: #6366f1;

  /* Volume Colors */
  --volume-up: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.8);
  --volume-down: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.8);
  --volume-neutral: rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.8);

  /* Alert Colors */
  --alert-success: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1);
  --alert-danger: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
  --alert-warning: rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.1);
  --alert-info: rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1);

  /* Border Colors - 清晰的边框 */
  --border-primary: #e2e8f0;
  --border-secondary: #f1f5f9;
  --border-tertiary: #f8fafc;
  --divider: #e2e8f0;

  /* Shadow Effects - 轻量阴影 */
  --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  --shadow-md: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.07);
  --shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  --shadow-xl: 0 20px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);

  /* Glass morphism effect - 清爽的玻璃效果 */
  --glass-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  --glass-border: rgba(226, 232, 240, 0.5);
  --glass-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);

  /* Typography - 清晰的字体 */
  --font-xs: 11px;
  --font-sm: 12px;
  --font-base: 14px;
  --font-lg: 16px;
  --font-xl: 18px;
  --font-2xl: 20px;
  --font-3xl: 24px;

  --font-light: 300;
  --font-normal: 400;
  --font-medium: 500;
  --font-semibold: 600;
  --font-bold: 700;

  --leading-tight: 1.25;
  --leading-normal: 1.5;
  --leading-relaxed: 1.75;

  /* Spacing - 简洁的间距 */
  --space-xs: 4px;
  --space-sm: 8px;
  --space-md: 12px;
  --space-lg: 16px;
  --space-xl: 20px;
  --space-2xl: 24px;
  --space-3xl: 32px;
  --space-4xl: 40px;

  /* Border Radius - 现代的圆角 */
  --radius-sm: 1px;
  --radius-md: 1px;
  --radius-lg: 1px;
  --radius-xl: 1px;
  --radius-full: 9999px;

  /* Transitions - 流畅的过渡 */
  --transition-fast: 150ms;
  --transition-normal: 300ms;
  --transition-slow: 500ms;

  --ease-in: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 1, 1);
  --ease-out: cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1);
  --ease-in-out: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}

/* 应用简洁明快主题 */
.clean-theme {
  color-scheme: light;
}

.clean-theme body {
  background-color: var(--bg-primary);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-family:
    -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial,
    sans-serif;
  font-size: var(--font-base);
  line-height: var(--leading-normal);
}

/* 滚动条样式 */
.clean-theme ::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 8px;
  height: 8px;
}

.clean-theme ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: var(--bg-secondary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
}

.clean-theme ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background: var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
}

.clean-theme ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
  background: var(--text-tertiary);
}

/* 卡片样式 */
.clean-theme .card {
  background-color: var(--surface-primary);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal) var(--ease-out);
}

.clean-theme .card:hover {
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary);
}

/* 按钮样式 */
.clean-theme .btn {
  padding: var(--space-sm) var(--space-lg);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-weight: var(--font-medium);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal) var(--ease-out);
  font-size: var(--font-base);
}

.clean-theme .btn-primary {
  background-color: var(--btn-primary);
  color: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--btn-primary);
}

.clean-theme .btn-primary:hover {
  background-color: var(--btn-primary-hover);
  border-color: var(--btn-primary-hover);
  box-shadow: var(--glow-primary);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.clean-theme .btn-secondary {
  background-color: var(--btn-secondary);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
}

.clean-theme .btn-secondary:hover {
  background-color: var(--btn-secondary-hover);
  border-color: var(--border-secondary);
}

/* 输入框样式 */
.clean-theme .input {
  background-color: var(--input-bg);
  /*border: 0px solid var(--input-border);*/
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  color: var(--input-text);
  padding: var(--space-sm) var(--space-md);
  font-size: var(--font-base);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal) var(--ease-out);
}

.clean-theme .input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--input-focus);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1);
}

.clean-theme .input::placeholder {
  color: var(--input-placeholder);
}

/* 市场数据样式 */
.clean-theme .price-up {
  color: var(--market-up);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
}

.clean-theme .price-down {
  color: var(--market-down);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
}

.clean-theme .price-neutral {
  color: var(--market-neutral);
}

/* 交易按钮 */
.clean-theme .buy-btn {
  background-color: var(--buy-color);
  color: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--buy-color);
}

.clean-theme .buy-btn:hover {
  background-color: #059669;
  box-shadow: var(--glow-success);
}

.clean-theme .sell-btn {
  background-color: var(--sell-color);
  color: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--sell-color);
}

.clean-theme .sell-btn:hover {
  background-color: #dc2626;
  box-shadow: var(--glow-danger);
}

/* 状态指示器 */
.clean-theme .status-indicator {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: var(--space-xs);
  padding: var(--space-xs) var(--space-sm);
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
  font-weight: var(--font-medium);
}

.clean-theme .status-online {
  color: var(--status-online);
  background-color: var(--alert-success);
}

.clean-theme .status-offline {
  color: var(--status-offline);
  background-color: var(--alert-danger);
}

.clean-theme .status-warning {
  color: var(--status-warning);
  background-color: var(--alert-warning);
}

.clean-theme .status-info {
  color: var(--status-info);
  background-color: var(--alert-info);
}

/* 警报样式 */
.clean-theme .alert {
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-lg);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  border-left: 4px solid;
  margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
}

.clean-theme .alert-success {
  background-color: var(--alert-success);
  border-left-color: var(--market-up);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.clean-theme .alert-danger {
  background-color: var(--alert-danger);
  border-left-color: var(--market-down);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.clean-theme .alert-warning {
  background-color: var(--alert-warning);
  border-left-color: var(--market-volatile);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.clean-theme .alert-info {
  background-color: var(--alert-info);
  border-left-color: var(--status-info);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

/* 图表样式 */
.clean-theme .chart-container {
  background-color: var(--surface-primary);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  padding: var(--space-lg);
}

.clean-theme .chart-grid {
  stroke: var(--chart-grid);
  stroke-width: 1;
}

.clean-theme .chart-axis {
  stroke: var(--chart-axis);
  stroke-width: 1;
}

.clean-theme .chart-axis-text {
  fill: var(--text-tertiary);
  font-size: var(--font-xs);
}

.clean-theme .chart-line-up {
  stroke: var(--chart-line-up);
  stroke-width: 2;
  fill: none;
}

.clean-theme .chart-line-down {
  stroke: var(--chart-line-down);
  stroke-width: 2;
  fill: none;
}

.clean-theme .chart-line-neutral {
  stroke: var(--chart-line-neutral);
  stroke-width: 2;
  fill: none;
}

/* 导航样式 */
.clean-theme .nav {
  background-color: var(--surface-primary);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
}

.clean-theme .nav-item {
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-lg);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal) var(--ease-out);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
}

.clean-theme .nav-item:hover {
  color: var(--text-primary);
  background-color: var(--bg-hover);
}

.clean-theme .nav-item.active {
  color: var(--btn-primary);
  background-color: var(--alert-info);
}

/* 表格样式 */
.clean-theme .table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  background-color: var(--surface-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  overflow: hidden;
}

.clean-theme .table th,
.clean-theme .table td {
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-lg);
  text-align: left;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
}

.clean-theme .table th {
  background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
}

.clean-theme .table td {
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.clean-theme .table tr:hover {
  background-color: var(--bg-hover);
}

.clean-theme .table tr:last-child td {
  border-bottom: none;
}

/* 模态框样式 */
.clean-theme .modal {
  background-color: var(--surface-overlay);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-xl);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.clean-theme .modal-header {
  background-color: var(--surface-primary);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  padding: var(--space-lg);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg) var(--radius-lg) 0 0;
}

.clean-theme .modal-body {
  padding: var(--space-lg);
}

.clean-theme .modal-footer {
  background-color: var(--surface-primary);
  border-top: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  padding: var(--space-lg);
  border-radius: 0 0 var(--radius-lg) var(--radius-lg);
}

/* 工具提示样式 */
.clean-theme .tooltip {
  background-color: var(--bg-quaternary);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  padding: var(--space-sm) var(--space-md);
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

/* 加载动画 */
.clean-theme .loading-spinner {
  border: 2px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-top: 2px solid var(--btn-primary);
  border-radius: 50%;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* 实用工具类 */
.clean-theme .positive {
  color: var(--market-up);
}

.clean-theme .negative {
  color: var(--market-down);
}

.clean-theme .neutral {
  color: var(--market-neutral);
}

/* 焦点可见性 */
.clean-theme *:focus-visible {
  outline: 2px solid var(--input-focus);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* 清爽的卡片样式 */
.clean-theme .clean-card {
  background: var(--gradient-card);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal) var(--ease-out);
}

.clean-theme .clean-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary);
}

/* 清爽的按钮样式 */
.clean-theme .clean-button {
  background: var(--gradient-glass);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-xl);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal) var(--ease-out);
}

.clean-theme .clean-button:hover {
  background: var(--btn-primary);
  color: white;
  border-color: var(--btn-primary);
  box-shadow: var(--glow-primary);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

/* 清爽的统计卡片 */
.clean-theme .stats-card {
  background: var(--surface-primary);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  padding: var(--space-xl);
  text-align: center;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal) var(--ease-out);
}

.clean-theme .stats-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary);
}

.clean-theme .stats-value {
  font-size: var(--font-2xl);
  font-weight: var(--font-bold);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: var(--space-xs);
}

.clean-theme .stats-label {
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-weight: var(--font-medium);
}

/* 清爽的表格 */
.clean-theme .clean-table {
  background: var(--surface-primary);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  overflow: hidden;
}

.clean-theme .clean-table table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
}

.clean-theme .clean-table th,
.clean-theme .clean-table td {
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-lg);
  text-align: left;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-secondary);
}

.clean-theme .clean-table th {
  background: var(--bg-secondary);
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
}

.clean-theme .clean-table td {
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.clean-theme .clean-table tr:hover {
  background: var(--bg-hover);
}

/* 清爽的输入框 */
.clean-theme .clean-input {
  background: var(--input-bg);
  /*border: 0px solid var(--input-border);*/
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  color: var(--input-text);
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-lg);
  font-size: var(--font-base);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal) var(--ease-out);
}

.clean-theme .clean-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--input-focus);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1);
}

/* 流畅的动画 */
.clean-theme .fade-in {
  animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  from { 
    opacity: 0; 
    transform: translateY(20px); 
  }
  to { 
    opacity: 1; 
    transform: translateY(0); 
  }
}

.clean-theme .slide-in {
  animation: slideIn 0.6s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slideIn {
  from { 
    opacity: 0; 
    transform: translateX(-30px); 
  }
  to { 
    opacity: 1; 
    transform: translateX(0); 
  }
}

.clean-theme .scale-in {
  animation: scaleIn 0.4s ease-out;
}

@keyframes scaleIn {
  from { 
    opacity: 0; 
    transform: scale(0.9); 
  }
  to { 
    opacity: 1; 
    transform: scale(1); 
  }
}

/* 减少动画支持 */
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  .clean-theme * {
    animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
    animation-iteration-count: 1 !important;
    transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
  }
}

/* 响应式设计 */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .clean-theme .stats-card {
    padding: var(--space-lg);
  }
  
  .clean-theme .stats-value {
    font-size: var(--font-xl);
  }
  
  .clean-theme .clean-card {
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  }

.login-container[data-v-fa254d35] {
  min-height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
  padding: 20px;
  position: relative;
}
.login-container[data-v-fa254d35]::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 10% 20%, rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 90% 80%, rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}
.login-box[data-v-fa254d35] {
  background: var(--glass-bg) !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border) !important;
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl) !important;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium-lg) !important;
  padding: 48px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 440px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
}
.login-box[data-v-fa254d35]::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s ease;
}
.login-box[data-v-fa254d35]:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}
.login-box[data-v-fa254d35]:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px) !important;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium-xl) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary) !important;
}
.login-header[data-v-fa254d35] {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 36px;
}
.login-header h1[data-v-fa254d35] {
  font-size: 32px;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: 12px;
  font-weight: 700;
  text-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}
.login-header p[data-v-fa254d35] {
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-size: var(--font-base);
  margin: 0;
  font-weight: var(--font-normal);
}
.login-form[data-v-fa254d35] {
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}
.form-options[data-v-fa254d35] {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}
.forgot-password[data-v-fa254d35] {
  color: var(--btn-primary);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
  font-weight: var(--font-medium);
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
}
.forgot-password[data-v-fa254d35]:hover {
  color: var(--btn-primary-hover);
  text-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.4);
}
.login-button[data-v-fa254d35] {
  width: 100%;
  height: 48px;
  font-size: var(--font-lg);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
  background: var(--btn-primary) !important;
  border-color: var(--btn-primary) !important;
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg) !important;
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.login-button[data-v-fa254d35]::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) 0%, transparent 70%);
  transition: all 0.5s ease;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}
.login-button[data-v-fa254d35]:hover::before {
  width: 300px;
  height: 300px;
}
.login-button[data-v-fa254d35]:hover {
  background: var(--btn-primary-hover) !important;
  border-color: var(--btn-primary-hover) !important;
  box-shadow: var(--glow-primary) !important;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}
.login-footer[data-v-fa254d35] {
  text-align: center;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-size: var(--font-base);
  margin-top: 24px;
}
.register-link[data-v-fa254d35] {
  color: var(--btn-primary);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
}
.register-link[data-v-fa254d35]:hover {
  color: var(--btn-primary-hover);
  text-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.4);
}

/* 表单样式 */
.el-form-item__label[data-v-fa254d35] {
  color: var(--text-secondary) !important;
  font-weight: var(--font-medium) !important;
  font-size: var(--font-sm) !important;
}
.el-input__wrapper[data-v-fa254d35] {
  background: var(--input-bg) !important;
  border-color: var(--input-border) !important;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md) !important;
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring) !important;
}
.el-input__wrapper[data-v-fa254d35]:hover {
  border-color: var(--input-hover) !important;
}
.el-input__wrapper.is-focus[data-v-fa254d35] {
  border-color: var(--input-focus) !important;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px var(--glow-primary) !important;
}
.el-input__inner[data-v-fa254d35] {
  color: var(--input-text) !important;
  font-size: var(--font-base) !important;
}

/* 复选框样式 */
.el-checkbox__label[data-v-fa254d35] {
  color: var(--text-secondary) !important;
  font-size: var(--font-base) !important;
}
.el-checkbox__input.is-checked .el-checkbox__inner[data-v-fa254d35] {
  background-color: var(--btn-primary) !important;
  border-color: var(--btn-primary) !important;
}
.el-checkbox__inner[data-v-fa254d35]:hover {
  border-color: var(--btn-primary) !important;
}
.el-checkbox__inner[data-v-fa254d35] {
  background: var(--input-bg) !important;
  border-color: var(--input-border) !important;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm) !important;
}

/* 响应式设计 */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
.login-container[data-v-fa254d35] {
    padding: 12px;
}
.login-box[data-v-fa254d35] {
    padding: 32px 24px;
    max-width: 100%;
}
.login-header h1[data-v-fa254d35] {
    font-size: var(--font-xl);
}
.login-header p[data-v-fa254d35] {
    font-size: var(--font-sm);
}
.form-options[data-v-fa254d35] {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 12px;
    align-items: flex-start;
}
.login-button[data-v-fa254d35] {
    height: 44px;
    font-size: var(--font-base);
}
.login-footer[data-v-fa254d35] {
    font-size: var(--font-sm);
}
}

.nav-footer.collapsed[data-v-b671b3fa] {

.tab-system[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  height: 100%;
  background: var(--bg-secondary);
}
.tab-header[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  background: var(--surface-elevated);
  height: 40px;
  min-height: 40px;
  max-height: 40px;
}
.tab-list[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  flex: 1;
  overflow-x: auto;
  overflow-y: hidden;
  flex-wrap: nowrap;
  min-height: 40px;
}
.tab-list[data-v-2ef7a4b3]::-webkit-scrollbar {
  height: 2px;
}
.tab-list[data-v-2ef7a4b3]::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: var(--bg-primary);
}
.tab-list[data-v-2ef7a4b3]::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background: var(--btn-primary);
  border-radius: 1px;
}
.tab-item[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  border-right: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  white-space: nowrap;
  user-select: none;
  min-width: 80px;
  max-width: 200px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
  height: 40px;
}
.tab-item[data-v-2ef7a4b3]:hover {
  background: var(--bg-hover);
}
.tab-item.active[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  background: var(--bg-secondary);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  border-bottom: 2px solid var(--text-primary);
}
.tab-icon[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  font-size: 14px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}
.tab-title[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 500;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  white-space: nowrap;
  flex: 1;
  min-width: 0;
}
.tab-close[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  border-radius: 2px;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}
.tab-item:hover .tab-close[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  opacity: 1;
}
.tab-close[data-v-2ef7a4b3]:hover {
  background: var(--market-down);
  color: white;
}
.tab-close .el-icon[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  font-size: 12px;
}
.tab-actions[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 0 8px;
  border-left: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
}
.tab-content[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  flex: 1;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
}
.tab-pane[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  opacity: 0;
  visibility: hidden;
  transition: opacity 0.2s, visibility 0.2s;
}
.tab-pane.active[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  opacity: 1;
  visibility: visible;
}

/* 响应式设计 */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
.tab-item[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
    padding: 8px 8px;
    min-width: 60px;
}
.tab-title[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
    font-size: 12px;
}
.tab-icon[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
    font-size: 12px;
}
}

/* 动画效果 */
.tab-item[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  position: relative;
}
.tab-item[data-v-2ef7a4b3]::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  background: var(--text-primary);
  transform: scaleX(0);
  transition: transform 0.2s ease;
}
.tab-item.active[data-v-2ef7a4b3]::after {
  transform: scaleX(1);
}

/* 加载占位符 */
.loading-placeholder[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  height: 100%;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  gap: 12px;
}
.loading-icon[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  font-size: 24px;
  animation: spin-2ef7a4b3 1s linear infinite;
}
@keyframes spin-2ef7a4b3 {
from {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
}
to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
}
}

/* 自定义滚动条样式 */
.tab-list[data-v-2ef7a4b3] {
  scrollbar-width: thin;
  scrollbar-color: var(--btn-primary) var(--bg-primary);
}

/* Element Plus 组件样式覆盖 */
[data-v-2ef7a4b3] .el-button {
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  padding: 4px 8px;
  height: 24px;
}
[data-v-2ef7a4b3] .el-button:hover {
  background: var(--bg-hover);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}
[data-v-2ef7a4b3] .el-dropdown-menu {
  background: var(--bg-secondary);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
}
[data-v-2ef7a4b3] .el-dropdown-menu__item {
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-size: 12px;
}
[data-v-2ef7a4b3] .el-dropdown-menu__item:hover {
  background: var(--bg-hover);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.v3-layout[data-v-9a358e25] {
  height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  background: var(--bg-primary);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

/* 顶部状态栏 */

/* Professional trading interface color scheme */

:root {
  /* Core Background Colors */
  --bg-primary: #0a0a0a;
  --bg-secondary: #121212;
  --bg-tertiary: #1a1a1a;
  --bg-quaternary: #222222;
  --bg-hover: #2a2a2a;
  --bg-active: #333333;

  /* Surface Colors */
  --surface-primary: #0d0d0d;
  --surface-secondary: #141414;
  --surface-elevated: #1c1c1c;
  --surface-overlay: #242424;

  /* Premium Gradient Backgrounds */
  --gradient-primary: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0a0a 0%, #1a1a2e 50%, #16213e 100%);
  --gradient-surface: linear-gradient(135deg, #0d0d0d 0%, #1c1c1c 100%);
  --gradient-card: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.03) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,0.01) 100%);
  --gradient-glass: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 100%);

  /* Premium Glow Effects */
  --glow-primary: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.3), 0 0 40px rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.1);
  --glow-success: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.3), 0 0 40px rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.1);
  --glow-danger: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.3), 0 0 40px rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.1);
  --glow-warning: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 149, 0, 0.3), 0 0 40px rgba(255, 149, 0, 0.1);

  /* Premium Border Effects */
  --border-glow-primary: 1px solid rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.3);
  --border-glow-success: 1px solid rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.3);
  --border-glow-danger: 1px solid rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.3);
  --border-glow-warning: 1px solid rgba(255, 149, 0, 0.3);

  /* Premium Shadow Effects */
  --shadow-premium: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4), 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  --shadow-premium-lg: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5), 0 8px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --shadow-glass: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);

  /* Premium Animation Timing */
  --transition-smooth: 400ms;
  --transition-bounce: cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.265, 1.55);
  --transition-spring: cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);

  /* Text Colors */
  --text-primary: #ffffff;
  --text-secondary: #e0e0e0;
  --text-tertiary: #b0b0b0;
  --text-muted: #808080;
  --text-disabled: #606060;

  /* Market Data Colors */
  --market-up: #00d4aa;
  --market-down: #ff3b30;
  --market-neutral: #ffffff;
  --market-volatile: #ff9500;

  /* Trading Colors */
  --buy-color: #00d4aa;
  --sell-color: #ff3b30;
  --hold-color: #007aff;

  /* Status Colors */
  --status-online: #00d4aa;
  --status-offline: #ff3b30;
  --status-warning: #ff9500;
  --status-info: #007aff;

  /* Interactive Elements */
  --btn-primary: #007aff;
  --btn-primary-hover: #0056b3;
  --btn-secondary: #404040;
  --btn-secondary-hover: #505050;

  /* Form Elements */
  --input-bg: #1a1a1a;
  --input-border: #404040;
  --input-focus: #007aff;
  --input-text: #ffffff;
  --input-placeholder: #808080;

  /* Chart Colors */
  --chart-grid: #2a2a2a;
  --chart-axis: #606060;
  --chart-line-up: #00d4aa;
  --chart-line-down: #ff3b30;
  --chart-line-neutral: #007aff;

  /* Volume Colors */
  --volume-up: rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.8);
  --volume-down: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.8);
  --volume-neutral: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);

  /* Alert Colors */
  --alert-success: rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.1);
  --alert-danger: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.1);
  --alert-warning: rgba(255, 149, 0, 0.1);
  --alert-info: rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.1);

  /* Border Colors */
  --border-primary: #2a2a2a;
  --border-secondary: #404040;
  --border-tertiary: #505050;
  --divider: #2a2a2a;

  /* Shadow Effects */
  --shadow-sm: 0 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --shadow-md: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  --shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  --shadow-xl: 0 20px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);

  /* Glass morphism effect */
  --glass-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  --glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --glass-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);

  /* Typography */
  --font-xs: 11px;
  --font-sm: 12px;
  --font-base: 14px;
  --font-lg: 16px;
  --font-xl: 18px;
  --font-2xl: 20px;
  --font-3xl: 24px;

  --font-light: 300;
  --font-normal: 400;
  --font-medium: 500;
  --font-semibold: 600;
  --font-bold: 700;

  --leading-tight: 1.25;
  --leading-normal: 1.5;
  --leading-relaxed: 1.75;

  /* Spacing */
  --space-xs: 4px;
  --space-sm: 8px;
  --space-md: 12px;
  --space-lg: 16px;
  --space-xl: 20px;
  --space-2xl: 24px;
  --space-3xl: 32px;
  --space-4xl: 40px;

  /* Border Radius */
  --radius-sm: 4px;
  --radius-md: 6px;
  --radius-lg: 8px;
  --radius-xl: 12px;
  --radius-full: 9999px;

  /* Transitions */
  --transition-fast: 150ms;
  --transition-normal: 300ms;
  --transition-slow: 500ms;

  --ease-in: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 1, 1);
  --ease-out: cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1);
  --ease-in-out: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}

/* Dark mode application */
.dark {
  color-scheme: dark;
}

/* Apply dark theme to body */
.dark body {
  background-color: var(--bg-primary);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-family:
    -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu,
    Cantarell, sans-serif;
  font-size: var(--font-base);
  line-height: var(--leading-normal);
}

/* Scrollbar styling */
.dark ::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 8px;
  height: 8px;
}

.dark ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: var(--bg-secondary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
}

.dark ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background: var(--border-secondary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
}

.dark ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
  background: var(--border-tertiary);
}

/* Card styling */
.dark .card {
  background-color: var(--surface-elevated);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

/* Button styling */
.dark .btn {
  padding: var(--space-sm) var(--space-lg);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-weight: var(--font-medium);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal) var(--ease-out);
}

.dark .btn-primary {
  background-color: var(--btn-primary);
  color: white;
}

.dark .btn-primary:hover {
  background-color: var(--btn-primary-hover);
  box-shadow: var(--glow-primary);
}

.dark .btn-secondary {
  background-color: var(--btn-secondary);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.dark .btn-secondary:hover {
  background-color: var(--btn-secondary-hover);
}

/* Input styling */
.dark .input {
  background-color: var(--input-bg);
  border: 1px solid var(--input-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  color: var(--input-text);
  padding: var(--space-sm) var(--space-md);
  font-size: var(--font-base);
  transition: all var(--transition-normal) var(--ease-out);
}

.dark .input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--input-focus);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px var(--glow-primary);
}

.dark .input::placeholder {
  color: var(--input-placeholder);
}

/* Market data styling */
.dark .price-up {
  color: var(--market-up);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
}

.dark .price-down {
  color: var(--market-down);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
}

.dark .price-neutral {
  color: var(--market-neutral);
}

/* Trading buttons */
.dark .buy-btn {
  background-color: var(--buy-color);
  color: white;
}

.dark .buy-btn:hover {
  background-color: #00a885;
  box-shadow: var(--glow-success);
}

.dark .sell-btn {
  background-color: var(--sell-color);
  color: white;
}

.dark .sell-btn:hover {
  background-color: #e02e24;
  box-shadow: var(--glow-danger);
}

/* Status indicators */
.dark .status-indicator {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: var(--space-xs);
  padding: var(--space-xs) var(--space-sm);
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
  font-weight: var(--font-medium);
}

.dark .status-online {
  color: var(--status-online);
  background-color: var(--alert-success);
}

.dark .status-offline {
  color: var(--status-offline);
  background-color: var(--alert-danger);
}

.dark .status-warning {
  color: var(--status-warning);
  background-color: var(--alert-warning);
}

.dark .status-info {
  color: var(--status-info);
  background-color: var(--alert-info);
}

/* Alert styling */
.dark .alert {
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-lg);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  border-left: 4px solid;
  margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
}

.dark .alert-success {
  background-color: var(--alert-success);
  border-left-color: var(--market-up);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.dark .alert-danger {
  background-color: var(--alert-danger);
  border-left-color: var(--market-down);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.dark .alert-warning {
  background-color: var(--alert-warning);
  border-left-color: var(--market-volatile);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.dark .alert-info {
  background-color: var(--alert-info);
  border-left-color: var(--status-info);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

/* Chart styling */
.dark .chart-container {
  background-color: var(--surface-elevated);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  padding: var(--space-lg);
}

.dark .chart-grid {
  stroke: var(--chart-grid);
  stroke-width: 1;
}

.dark .chart-axis {
  stroke: var(--chart-axis);
  stroke-width: 1;
}

.dark .chart-axis-text {
  fill: var(--text-tertiary);
  font-size: var(--font-xs);
}

.dark .chart-line-up {
  stroke: var(--chart-line-up);
  stroke-width: 2;
  fill: none;
}

.dark .chart-line-down {
  stroke: var(--chart-line-down);
  stroke-width: 2;
  fill: none;
}

.dark .chart-line-neutral {
  stroke: var(--chart-line-neutral);
  stroke-width: 2;
  fill: none;
}

/* Navigation styling */
.dark .nav {
  background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
}

.dark .nav-item {
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-lg);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: all var(--transition-normal) var(--ease-out);
}

.dark .nav-item:hover {
  color: var(--text-primary);
  background-color: var(--bg-hover);
}

.dark .nav-item.active {
  color: var(--btn-primary);
  background-color: var(--bg-active);
}

/* Table styling */
.dark .table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  background-color: var(--surface-elevated);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  overflow: hidden;
}

.dark .table th,
.dark .table td {
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-lg);
  text-align: left;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
}

.dark .table th {
  background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.5px;
}

.dark .table td {
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.dark .table tr:hover {
  background-color: var(--bg-hover);
}

.dark .table tr:last-child td {
  border-bottom: none;
}

/* Modal styling */
.dark .modal {
  background-color: var(--surface-overlay);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-xl);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.dark .modal-header {
  background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  padding: var(--space-lg);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg) var(--radius-lg) 0 0;
}

.dark .modal-body {
  padding: var(--space-lg);
}

.dark .modal-footer {
  background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
  border-top: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  padding: var(--space-lg);
  border-radius: 0 0 var(--radius-lg) var(--radius-lg);
}

/* Tooltip styling */
.dark .tooltip {
  background-color: var(--bg-quaternary);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  padding: var(--space-sm) var(--space-md);
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

/* Loading spinner */
.dark .loading-spinner {
  border: 2px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-top: 2px solid var(--btn-primary);
  border-radius: 50%;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  100% {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* Utility classes for market data */
.dark .positive {
  color: var(--market-up);
}

.dark .negative {
  color: var(--market-down);
}

.dark .neutral {
  color: var(--market-neutral);
}

/* Focus visible for accessibility */
.dark *:focus-visible {
  outline: 2px solid var(--input-focus);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* Premium Component Styles */
.dark .premium-card {
  background: var(--gradient-card);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-glass);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.dark .premium-card::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s ease;
}

.dark .premium-card:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.dark .premium-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium-lg);
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary);
}

.dark .premium-button {
  background: var(--gradient-glass);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-xl);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.dark .premium-button::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) 0%, transparent 70%);
  transition: all 0.5s ease;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

.dark .premium-button:hover::before {
  width: 300px;
  height: 300px;
}

.dark .premium-button:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--glow-primary);
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary);
}

.dark .premium-header {
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
  padding: var(--space-2xl) 0;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.dark .premium-header::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 20% 50%, rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 80% 50%, rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  animation: floating 6s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes floating {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0px); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-20px); }
}

.dark .premium-section {
  background: var(--gradient-surface);
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
}

.dark .premium-section::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 10% 20%, rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.05) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 90% 80%, rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.05) 0%, transparent 50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}

.dark .premium-stats-card {
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  padding: var(--space-xl);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
}

.dark .premium-stats-card::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 2px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--btn-primary), var(--market-up), var(--market-down));
  animation: shimmer 2s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes shimmer {
  0% { transform: translateX(-100%); }
  100% { transform: translateX(100%); }
}

.dark .premium-stats-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium-lg);
}

.dark .premium-table {
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  overflow: hidden;
}

.dark .premium-table .el-table {
  background: transparent;
}

.dark .premium-table .el-table th {
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
}

.dark .premium-table .el-table td {
  background: transparent;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.dark .premium-table .el-table tr:hover td {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
}

.dark .premium-input {
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-lg);
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
}

.dark .premium-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary);
  box-shadow: var(--glow-primary);
}

.dark .premium-modal {
  background: var(--gradient-surface);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium-lg);
}

.dark .premium-loading {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: var(--space-md);
  padding: var(--space-2xl);
}

.dark .premium-loading .spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border: 3px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-top: 3px solid var(--btn-primary);
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: premium-spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes premium-spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

/* Premium animations */
.dark .fade-in {
  animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); }
  to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
}

.dark .slide-in {
  animation: slideIn 0.6s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slideIn {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-50px); }
  to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); }
}

.dark .scale-in {
  animation: scaleIn 0.4s ease-out;
}

@keyframes scaleIn {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.8); }
  to { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); }
}

/* Reduced motion support */
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  .dark * {
    animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
    animation-iteration-count: 1 !important;
    transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
  }
}
/* Bright Professional Trading Theme */
/* Enhanced visibility and readability */

:root {
  /* Core Background Colors - 更明亮的背景 */
  --bg-primary: #1a1a1a;
  --bg-secondary: #242424;
  --bg-tertiary: #2e2e2e;
  --bg-quaternary: #383838;
  --bg-hover: #424242;
  --bg-active: #4a4a4a;

  /* Surface Colors - 提高对比度 */
  --surface-primary: #1e1e1e;
  --surface-secondary: #282828;
  --surface-elevated: #323232;
  --surface-overlay: #3c3c3c;

  /* Premium Gradient Backgrounds - 更亮的渐变 */
  --gradient-primary: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a1a 0%, #2a2a3e 50%, #26334e 100%);
  --gradient-surface: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1e1e 0%, #323232 100%);
  --gradient-card: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.08) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,0.03) 100%);
  --gradient-glass: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.15) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,0.08) 100%);

  /* Premium Glow Effects - 增强发光效果 */
  --glow-primary: 0 0 25px rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.4), 0 0 50px rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.15);
  --glow-success: 0 0 25px rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.4), 0 0 50px rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.15);
  --glow-danger: 0 0 25px rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.4), 0 0 50px rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.15);
  --glow-warning: 0 0 25px rgba(255, 149, 0, 0.4), 0 0 50px rgba(255, 149, 0, 0.15);

  /* Premium Border Effects - 更明显的边框 */
  --border-glow-primary: 1px solid rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.5);
  --border-glow-success: 1px solid rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.5);
  --border-glow-danger: 1px solid rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.5);
  --border-glow-warning: 1px solid rgba(255, 149, 0, 0.5);

  /* Text Colors - 提高文字对比度 */
  --text-primary: #ffffff;
  --text-secondary: #f0f0f0;
  --text-tertiary: #d0d0d0;
  --text-muted: #a0a0a0;
  --text-disabled: #808080;

  /* Market Data Colors - 更鲜艳的颜色 */
  --market-up: #00e6b8;
  --market-down: #ff4757;
  --market-neutral: #ffffff;
  --market-volatile: #ffa500;

  /* Trading Colors */
  --buy-color: #00e6b8;
  --sell-color: #ff4757;
  --hold-color: #0088ff;

  /* Status Colors */
  --status-online: #00e6b8;
  --status-offline: #ff4757;
  --status-warning: #ffa500;
  --status-info: #0088ff;

  /* Interactive Elements - 更亮的按钮 */
  --btn-primary: #0088ff;
  --btn-primary-hover: #0066cc;
  --btn-secondary: #505050;
  --btn-secondary-hover: #606060;

  /* Form Elements - 更明亮的输入框 */
  --input-bg: #2a2a2a;
  --input-border: #505050;
  --input-focus: #0088ff;
  --input-text: #ffffff;
  --input-placeholder: #a0a0a0;

  /* Chart Colors - 更清晰的图表颜色 */
  --chart-grid: #404040;
  --chart-axis: #808080;
  --chart-line-up: #00e6b8;
  --chart-line-down: #ff4757;
  --chart-line-neutral: #0088ff;

  /* Border Colors - 更明显的边框 */
  --border-primary: #404040;
  --border-secondary: #505050;
  --border-tertiary: #606060;
  --divider: #404040;

  /* Glass morphism effect - 更明亮的玻璃效果 */
  --glass-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  --glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  --glass-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4), inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
}

/* 应用明亮主题 */
.bright-theme {
  color-scheme: dark;
}

.bright-theme body {
  background-color: var(--bg-primary);
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

/* 卡片样式增强 */
.bright-theme .stat-card,
.bright-theme .chart-card,
.bright-theme .performance-card,
.bright-theme .activity-card {
  background: var(--gradient-card);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.bright-theme .stat-card:hover,
.bright-theme .chart-card:hover,
.bright-theme .performance-card:hover,
.bright-theme .activity-card:hover {
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary);
  box-shadow: var(--glow-primary);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* 统计卡片增强 */
.bright-theme .stat-value {
  color: var(--text-primary);
  text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
}

.bright-theme .stat-title {
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-weight: 600;
}

.bright-theme .stat-change.positive {
  color: var(--market-up);
  text-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(0, 230, 184, 0.3);
}

.bright-theme .stat-change.negative {
  color: var(--market-down);
  text-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(255, 71, 87, 0.3);
}

/* 图表标题增强 */
.bright-theme .chart-header h3 {
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-weight: 700;
  text-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
}

/* 策略项目增强 */
.bright-theme .strategy-name {
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-weight: 600;
}

.bright-theme .strategy-type {
  color: var(--text-tertiary);
}

.bright-theme .metric-value.positive {
  color: var(--market-up);
  font-weight: 700;
  text-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0, 230, 184, 0.3);
}

.bright-theme .metric-value.negative {
  color: var(--market-down);
  font-weight: 700;
  text-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(255, 71, 87, 0.3);
}

/* 活动项目增强 */
.bright-theme .activity-title {
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-weight: 600;
}

.bright-theme .activity-description {
  color: var(--text-tertiary);
}

.bright-theme .activity-time {
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

/* 活动图标增强 */
.bright-theme .activity-icon {
  background: var(--gradient-glass);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.bright-theme .activity-icon.strategy .el-icon {
  color: var(--market-volatile);
  filter: drop-shadow(0 0 5px rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.3));
}

.bright-theme .activity-icon.trade .el-icon {
  color: var(--market-up);
  filter: drop-shadow(0 0 5px rgba(0, 230, 184, 0.3));
}

.bright-theme .activity-icon.system .el-icon {
  color: var(--btn-primary);
  filter: drop-shadow(0 0 5px rgba(0, 136, 255, 0.3));
}

.bright-theme .activity-icon.alert .el-icon {
  color: var(--market-down);
  filter: drop-shadow(0 0 5px rgba(255, 71, 87, 0.3));
}

/* Element Plus 组件样式覆盖 */
.bright-theme :deep(.el-radio-button__inner) {
  background: var(--surface-elevated);
  border-color: var(--border-primary);
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.bright-theme :deep(.el-radio-button__original-radio:checked + .el-radio-button__inner) {
  background: var(--btn-primary);
  border-color: var(--btn-primary);
  color: white;
  box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 136, 255, 0.3);
}

.bright-theme :deep(.el-tag) {
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  background: var(--gradient-glass);
  backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
}

.bright-theme :deep(.el-button) {
  background: var(--gradient-glass);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.bright-theme :deep(.el-button:hover) {
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary);
  box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 136, 255, 0.2);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

/* 滚动条增强 */
.bright-theme ::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
}

.bright-theme ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: var(--bg-secondary);
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.bright-theme ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--btn-primary), var(--market-up));
  border-radius: 5px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 136, 255, 0.3);
}

.bright-theme ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--btn-primary-hover), var(--market-up));
  box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 136, 255, 0.5);
}

/* 动画增强 */
.bright-theme .animate-fade-in {
  animation: brightFadeIn 0.6s ease-out;
}

@keyframes brightFadeIn {
  from { 
    opacity: 0; 
    transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.95); 
  }
  to { 
    opacity: 1; 
    transform: translateY(0) scale(1); 
  }
}

.bright-theme .animate-glow {
  animation: brightGlow 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
}

@keyframes brightGlow {
  from { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0, 136, 255, 0.2); 
  }
  to { 
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 136, 255, 0.4); 
  }
}

/* 响应式增强 */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .bright-theme .stat-card,
  .bright-theme .chart-card,
  .bright-theme .performance-card,
  .bright-theme .activity-card {
    border-radius: 8px;
    padding: 16px;
  }
  
  .bright-theme .stat-value {
    font-size: 20px;
  }
  
  .bright-theme .chart-header h3 {
    font-size: 14px;
  }
}/* Premium Global Styles for All Pages */
/* Bloomberg-Inspired Trading Interface */

/* Base Page Styles */
.premium-page {
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative;
  padding: 20px;
}

.premium-page::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 10% 20%, rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.05) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 90% 80%, rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.05) 0%, transparent 50%);
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* Premium Header */
.premium-header {
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  padding: var(--space-xl);
  margin-bottom: var(--space-xl);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-glass);
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

.premium-header::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s ease;
}

.premium-header:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.premium-header:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium-lg);
}

.premium-title {
  margin: 0;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: var(--font-3xl);
  text-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

.premium-subtitle {
  margin: 8px 0 0 0;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-size: var(--font-lg);
  font-weight: 400;
}

/* Premium Cards */
.premium-card {
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  padding: var(--space-xl);
  margin-bottom: var(--space-lg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-glass);
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.premium-card::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s ease;
}

.premium-card:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.premium-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium-lg);
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary);
}

.premium-card-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: var(--space-lg);
  padding-bottom: var(--space-md);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
}

.premium-card-title {
  margin: 0;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
  font-size: var(--font-xl);
}

/* Premium Stats Grid */
.premium-stats-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
  gap: var(--space-lg);
  margin-bottom: var(--space-xl);
}

.premium-stat-card {
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  padding: var(--space-xl);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
}

.premium-stat-card::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 3px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--btn-primary), var(--market-up), var(--market-down));
  animation: shimmer 2s linear infinite;
}

.premium-stat-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium-lg);
}

.premium-stat-value {
  font-size: var(--font-3xl);
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: var(--space-xs);
  text-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

.premium-stat-label {
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.premium-stat-change {
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-top: var(--space-xs);
}

.premium-stat-change.positive {
  color: var(--market-up);
}

.premium-stat-change.negative {
  color: var(--market-down);
}

/* Premium Table */
.premium-table-container {
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-glass);
}

.premium-table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
}

.premium-table th,
.premium-table td {
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-lg);
  text-align: left;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
}

.premium-table th {
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.5px;
}

.premium-table td {
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-weight: var(--font-normal);
}

.premium-table tr:hover td {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
}

.premium-table tr:last-child td {
  border-bottom: none;
}

/* Premium Forms */
.premium-form {
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  padding: var(--space-xl);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-glass);
}

.premium-form-group {
  margin-bottom: var(--space-lg);
}

.premium-form-label {
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: var(--space-sm);
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
}

.premium-form-input,
.premium-form-select,
.premium-form-textarea {
  width: 100%;
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-lg);
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-size: var(--font-base);
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
}

.premium-form-input:focus,
.premium-form-select:focus,
.premium-form-textarea:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary);
  box-shadow: var(--glow-primary);
}

.premium-form-input::placeholder,
.premium-form-select::placeholder,
.premium-form-textarea::placeholder {
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

/* Premium Buttons */
.premium-button {
  background: var(--gradient-glass);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  padding: var(--space-md) var(--space-xl);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: var(--space-sm);
}

.premium-button::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) 0%, transparent 70%);
  transition: all 0.5s ease;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

.premium-button:hover::before {
  width: 300px;
  height: 300px;
}

.premium-button:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--glow-primary);
  border-color: var(--border-glow-primary);
}

.premium-button.primary {
  background: var(--btn-primary);
  border-color: var(--btn-primary);
  color: white;
}

.premium-button.success {
  background: var(--market-up);
  border-color: var(--market-up);
  color: white;
}

.premium-button.danger {
  background: var(--market-down);
  border-color: var(--market-down);
  color: white;
}

.premium-button.warning {
  background: var(--market-volatile);
  border-color: var(--market-volatile);
  color: white;
}

/* Premium Badges */
.premium-badge {
  background: var(--glass-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-full);
  padding: var(--space-xs) var(--space-md);
  font-size: var(--font-sm);
  font-weight: var(--font-semibold);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: var(--space-xs);
  transition: all var(--transition-smooth) var(--transition-spring);
}

.premium-badge:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
}

.premium-badge.success {
  background: rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.2);
  border-color: var(--market-up);
  color: var(--market-up);
}

.premium-badge.danger {
  background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.2);
  border-color: var(--market-down);
  color: var(--market-down);
}

.premium-badge.warning {
  background: rgba(255, 149, 0, 0.2);
  border-color: var(--market-volatile);
  color: var(--market-volatile);
}

.premium-badge.info {
  background: rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.2);
  border-color: var(--btn-primary);
  color: var(--btn-primary);
}

/* Premium Animations */
@keyframes shimmer {
  0% { transform: translateX(-100%); }
  100% { transform: translateX(100%); }
}

@keyframes floating {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0px); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-10px); }
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
  50% { opacity: 0.7; }
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-50px); }
  to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); }
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(50px); }
  to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); }
}

@keyframes slideInUp {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(50px); }
  to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
}

@keyframes slideInDown {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-50px); }
  to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  from { opacity: 0; }
  to { opacity: 1; }
}

@keyframes scaleIn {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.8); }
  to { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); }
}

@keyframes rotateIn {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: rotate(-180deg) scale(0.8); }
  to { opacity: 1; transform: rotate(0deg) scale(1); }
}

/* Premium Animation Classes */
.animate-shimmer {
  animation: shimmer 2s linear infinite;
}

.animate-floating {
  animation: floating 3s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.animate-pulse {
  animation: pulse 2s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.animate-slide-in-left {
  animation: slideInLeft 0.6s ease-out;
}

.animate-slide-in-right {
  animation: slideInRight 0.6s ease-out;
}

.animate-slide-in-up {
  animation: slideInUp 0.6s ease-out;
}

.animate-slide-in-down {
  animation: slideInDown 0.6s ease-out;
}

.animate-fade-in {
  animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease-out;
}

.animate-scale-in {
  animation: scaleIn 0.4s ease-out;
}

.animate-rotate-in {
  animation: rotateIn 0.6s ease-out;
}

/* Premium Utility Classes */
.text-gradient-primary {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--text-primary), var(--market-up));
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.text-gradient-success {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--market-up), #00a885);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.text-gradient-danger {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--market-down), #e02e24);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.text-gradient-warning {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--market-volatile), #e07f00);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.glow-primary {
  text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.5);
}

.glow-success {
  text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 212, 170, 0.5);
}

.glow-danger {
  text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.5);
}

.glow-warning {
  text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 149, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Premium Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .premium-page {
    padding: 10px;
  }

  .premium-header {
    padding: var(--space-lg);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-lg);
  }

  .premium-title {
    font-size: var(--font-2xl);
  }

  .premium-stats-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: var(--space-md);
  }

  .premium-card {
    padding: var(--space-lg);
  }

  .premium-form {
    padding: var(--space-lg);
  }

  .premium-table th,
  .premium-table td {
    padding: var(--space-sm) var(--space-md);
    font-size: var(--font-sm);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .premium-header {
    text-align: center;
  }

  .premium-card-header {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: var(--space-md);
    text-align: center;
  }

  .premium-button {
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
  }
}
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700;800&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap');
/* Enhanced Premium Styles */
/* Modern Trading Interface Enhancements */
/* Enhanced Typography */
:root {
  /* Enhanced Color System */
  --primary-dark: #0a0e27;
  --secondary-dark: #151932;
  --accent-blue: #00d4ff;
  --accent-cyan: #00ff88;
  --accent-purple: #a55eea;
  --accent-orange: #ffa502;
  --accent-red: #ff4757;
  --accent-pink: #ff6b9d;
  
  /* Gradient Definitions */
  --gradient-primary: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-dark) 0%, var(--secondary-dark) 100%);
  --gradient-blue: linear-gradient(135deg, #00d4ff 0%, #0099cc 100%);
  --gradient-success: linear-gradient(135deg, #00ff88 0%, #00cc6a 100%);
  --gradient-danger: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff4757 0%, #cc0000 100%);
  --gradient-warning: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffa502 0%, #ff8800 100%);
  --gradient-purple: linear-gradient(135deg, #a55eea 0%, #8854d0 100%);
  
  /* Glass Effect Enhancements */
  --glass-bg: linear-gradient(135deg, 
    rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 0%, 
    rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02) 100%);
  --glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.18);
  --glass-shadow: 
    0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3),
    inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  
  /* Enhanced Spacing */
  --space-xs: 4px;
  --space-sm: 8px;
  --space-md: 12px;
  --space-lg: 16px;
  --space-xl: 24px;
  --space-2xl: 32px;
  --space-3xl: 48px;
  
  /* Enhanced Border Radius */
  --radius-sm: 6px;
  --radius-md: 8px;
  --radius-lg: 12px;
  --radius-xl: 16px;
  --radius-2xl: 20px;
  --radius-full: 9999px;
  
  /* Enhanced Shadows */
  --shadow-sm: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
  --shadow-md: 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  --shadow-lg: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
  --shadow-xl: 0 12px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --shadow-premium-lg: 0 16px 64px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  
  /* Glow Effects */
  --glow-primary: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.5);
  --glow-success: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.5);
  --glow-danger: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 71, 87, 0.5);
  --glow-warning: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 165, 2, 0.5);
  --glow-purple: 0 0 20px rgba(165, 94, 234, 0.5);
  
  /* Typography */
  --font-display: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif;
  --font-mono: 'JetBrains Mono', 'SF Mono', Monaco, 'Cascadia Code', monospace;
  --font-xs: 11px;
  --font-sm: 12px;
  --font-base: 14px;
  --font-lg: 16px;
  --font-xl: 18px;
  --font-2xl: 20px;
  --font-3xl: 24px;
  --font-4xl: 28px;
  --font-5xl: 32px;
  
  /* Transitions */
  --transition-fast: 0.15s ease;
  --transition-smooth: 0.3s ease;
  --transition-spring: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}
/* Enhanced Base Styles */

}

/* Enhanced Premium Cards */
